name: Axel Tetris
overview: The classic Tetris game in Axel's salsa. For a long time, 'Axel Software' had been eager to make their own version of one of the classics of all time; this desire has now materialized in this new publication! I am confident that our admirers of our previous works (and also the new ones) will appreciate the commitment always lavished in our projects, and the desire to make them more and more interesting, including this last splinter of creativity.
